name: Kpop Piano Game 2021
description:
Piano game for KPOP fan. All your love songs are here now.

Features:
1. Update your favorite songs weekly
2. Unlimited Speed piano game
3. Choose your own speed at the very first start level
4. 1000+ KPOP songs and update new ones weekly.
5. Beat your own top score!
6. Amazing sound quality - music smooth with your finger
7. Plenty of beautiful backgrounds just for you
8. No need internet. Just download game and enjoy!

Game rules:
Tap on the black tiles while listening to music. Enjoy fantastic KPOP songs, improve your speed! Speed increase in next round and never stop.

DISCLAIMER:
This game is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by films management, or record label.
This app does not include any copyrighted material.
The piano melodies are arranged with individual piano notes
This app is for entertainment purposes only.
